actions.name: BuildBotLocale
actions.description: Grants permission to build an existing bot locale in a bot

actions.name: CreateBot
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new bot and a test bot alias pointing to the DRAFT bot version

actions.name: CreateBotAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new bot alias in a bot

actions.name: CreateBotChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to create a bot channel in an existing bot

actions.name: CreateBotLocale
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new bot locale in an existing bot

actions.name: CreateBotVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new version of an existing bot

actions.name: CreateCustomVocabulary
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new custom vocabulary in an existing bot locale

actions.name: CreateExport
actions.description: Grants permission to create an export for an existing resource

actions.name: CreateIntent
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new intent in an existing bot locale

actions.name: CreateResourcePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new resource policy for a Lex resource

actions.name: CreateSlot
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new slot in an intent

actions.name: CreateSlotType
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new slot type in an existing bot locale

actions.name: CreateUploadUrl
actions.description: Grants permission to create an upload url for import file

actions.name: DeleteBot
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing bot
dependentActions: lex:DeleteBotAlias                                                                                        lex:DeleteBotChannel                                                                                        lex:DeleteBotLocale                                                                                        lex:DeleteBotVersion                                                                                        lex:DeleteIntent                                                                                        lex:DeleteSlot                                                                                        lex:DeleteSlotType

actions.name: DeleteBotAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing bot alias in a bot

actions.name: DeleteBotChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing bot channel

actions.name: DeleteBotLocale
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing bot locale in a bot

actions.name: DeleteBotVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing bot version

actions.name: DeleteCustomVocabulary
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing custom vocabulary in a bot locale

actions.name: DeleteExport
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing export

actions.name: DeleteImport
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing import

actions.name: DeleteIntent
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing intent in a bot locale

actions.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing resource policy for a Lex resource

actions.name: DeleteSession
actions.description: Grants permission to delete session information for a bot alias and user ID

actions.name: DeleteSlot
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing slot in an intent

actions.name: DeleteSlotType
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing slot type in a bot locale

actions.name: DeleteUtterances
actions.description: Grants permission to delete utterance data for a bot

actions.name: DescribeBot
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing bot

actions.name: DescribeBotAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing bot alias

actions.name: DescribeBotChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing bot channel

actions.name: DescribeBotLocale
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing bot locale

actions.name: DescribeBotRecommendation
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve metadata information about a bot recommendation

actions.name: DescribeBotVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing bot version

actions.name: DescribeCustomVocabulary
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing custom vocabulary

actions.name: DescribeCustomVocabularyMetadata
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve metadata of an existing custom vocabulary

actions.name: DescribeExport
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing export
dependentActions: lex:DescribeBot                                                                                        lex:DescribeBotLocale                                                                                        lex:DescribeIntent                                                                                        lex:DescribeSlot                                                                                        lex:DescribeSlotType                                                                                        lex:ListBotLocales                                                                                        lex:ListIntents                                                                                        lex:ListSlotTypes                                                                                        lex:ListSlots

actions.name: DescribeImport
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing import

actions.name: DescribeIntent
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing intent

actions.name: DescribeResourcePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing resource policy for a Lex resource

actions.name: DescribeSlot
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing slot

actions.name: DescribeSlotType
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing slot type

actions.name: GetSession
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve session information for a bot alias and user ID

actions.name: ListAggregatedUtterances
actions.description: Grants permission to list utterances and statistics for a bot

actions.name: ListBotAliases
actions.description: Grants permission to list bot aliases in an bot

actions.name: ListBotChannels
actions.description: Grants permission to list bot channels

actions.name: ListBotLocales
actions.description: Grants permission to list bot locales in a bot

actions.name: ListBotRecommendations
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of bot recommendations that meet the specified criteria

actions.name: ListBotVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to list existing bot versions

actions.name: ListBots
actions.description: Grants permission to list existing bots

actions.name: ListBuiltInIntents
actions.description: Grants permission to list built-in intents

actions.name: ListBuiltInSlotTypes
actions.description: Grants permission to list built-in slot types

actions.name: ListExports
actions.description: Grants permission to list existing exports

actions.name: ListImports
actions.description: Grants permission to list existing imports

actions.name: ListIntents
actions.description: Grants permission to list intents in a bot

actions.name: ListRecommendedIntents
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of recommended intents provided by the bot recommendation

actions.name: ListSlotTypes
actions.description: Grants permission to list slot types in a bot

actions.name: ListSlots
actions.description: Grants permission to list slots in an intent

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to lists tags for a Lex resource

actions.name: PutSession
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new session or modify an existing session for a bot alias and user ID

actions.name: RecognizeText
actions.description: Grants permission to send user input (text-only) to an bot alias

actions.name: RecognizeUtterance
actions.description: Grants permission to send user input (text or speech) to an bot alias

actions.name: SearchAssociatedTranscripts
actions.description: Grants permission to search for associated transcripts that meet the specified criteria

actions.name: StartBotRecommendation
actions.description: Grants permission to start a bot recommendation for an existing bot locale

actions.name: StartConversation
actions.description: Grants permission to stream user input (speech/text/DTMF) to a bot alias

actions.name: StartImport
actions.description: Grants permission to start a new import with the uploaded import file
dependentActions: lex:CreateBot                                                                                        lex:CreateBotLocale                                                                                        lex:CreateIntent                                                                                        lex:CreateSlot                                                                                        lex:CreateSlotType                                                                                        lex:DeleteBotLocale                                                                                        lex:DeleteIntent                                                                                        lex:DeleteSlot                                                                                        lex:DeleteSlotType                                                                                        lex:UpdateBot                                                                                        lex:UpdateBotLocale                                                                                        lex:UpdateIntent                                                                                        lex:UpdateSlot                                                                                        lex:UpdateSlotType

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add or overwrite tags of a Lex resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a Lex resource

actions.name: UpdateBot
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing bot

actions.name: UpdateBotAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing bot alias

actions.name: UpdateBotLocale
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing bot locale

actions.name: UpdateBotRecommendation
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing bot recommendation request

actions.name: UpdateCustomVocabulary
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing custom vocabulary

actions.name: UpdateExport
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing export

actions.name: UpdateIntent
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing intent

actions.name: UpdateResourcePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing resource policy for a Lex resource

actions.name: UpdateSlot
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing slot

actions.name: UpdateSlotType
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing slot type
